info.name: Swipe Rite Webnovel.com
info.description:
Make chapters show up like a slider/pages.
For those who are used to reading a page style ebook or pdf.

Using your mouse? Then use shift+scroll or use the bottom scroll bar to change page.
info.additionalInfo:
Works on Chrome version 69 (Will be shipped on September 2018) and Firefox version 39. Works with all color option in Qidian's setting. 7/11/2018 Fix for new chapters that have not been loaded yet Detail and Chapter list page divisions have background-colors that make them easier to read with the new html background. 7/16/2018 Replaced the background with pseudo-background(::before). Replaced the hexagon pattern with notebook paper texture. Replaced the opacity of some things. Turn back how the detail page looks. 8/29/2018 Added chrome's style scroll snap. 8/31/2018 Website update.

Features;

1. Chapters are made into horizontal slider. 2. A "Highlighter". Hover your cursor on text to keep track of your reading. Part's you have not read will be slightly transparent. 3. Transparent cursor. 4. A new background 5. Beginning of paragraphs have indent and are justified. One last thing, I might make similar style for other novel reading site, like Wuxiaworld or GravityTales for example. Feedback or even complain is fine. If you want to use the idea or publish your own modified code, is also fine lol. Just shout out mkay. -Archie Manalang
